content: Going over the list of PRs with "just a merge conflict", I found this lovely PR: by a new contributor, which has been awaiting review for more than a month now. I pinged the author about the merge conflict - but would somebody like to review it? I'm not a combinatorialist, hence not a very helpful reviewer.
Looking at the list of combinatorics reviewers: @Kyle Miller do you happen to have a moment to take a look, or can you suggest somebody else to ask? Thanks!
